name: Welcome (abbabon)
description:
This is a hosting simulation that lets you experience our representation of the pressure and burden of hosting. Will you try to satisfy your guests increasing loud demands, or remain in quiet solitude?

We try and show the contrast that is created between the house as a comfortable place and the loud and extreme atmosphere when it is crowded. Created for the Global Game Jam 2019, for which the theme was 'what 'home' means to you?'.

Control with Up, Down, Left, Right (or W A S D) and the Spacebar.

GGJ link - https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/welcome

Credits: 

Yonatan Hayon - visual artist

Zevik Perry - composer and sound designer

Amit Netanel - Unity developer

Adam Gobi - Project manager/game designer
